You may track the status of your request using the reference number provided via our website at http://www.phila.gov/311, replying to this email or dialing 3-1-1 (outside of Philadelphia dial 215-686-8686). Please note updates to the website may take up to 48 hours to appear.
We appreciate your patience.
Regards,
Philly311 Customer Support
